resources.string: Error: Bluetooth not supported by this device
Or scan the barcode on the share receiver
If you\'re using MongoLab and Azure this should be enabled
Replace example values in {}\'s with your correct values
This is the name of the collection where the CGM data will be stored
This is the name of the collection where the battery and other device data will be stored
The REST API is an alternative to direct mongodb upload
This only the base URL, the uploader will automatically append /entries for the POST. API_SECRET on the server should match yourpassphrase in this setting.
Comma separated list of ip:port (for example 37.142.132.220:50005,37.142.132.220:50010,mongodb://user:pass@ds053958.mongolab.com:53958/db/collection)
Enter ip addresses and ports of receivers (including mongodb addresses if needed)
For Bluetooth discovery to work on newer devices, location must be enabled. xDrip does not track your location and it can be disabled after pairing is successful.
Enable local broadcast of data so other apps (eg. NightWatch) can listen on new values
Show the BG trend on the xDrip Pebble watch face.
Something went wrong :( a report has been sent to help fix the issue.
Just click the Tick icon here to confirm. You shouldn\'t need to change the configuration string.
All interface tips will show again from the start
The Note Button now prompts for voice input.\n\nLong press on it to enter with keyboard or change options.
The Redo Button can step forwards through undone Treatment Simulations, Calibrations and Notes\n\nAfter 30 minutes it will hide again
The Undo Button can step backwards through Treatment Simulations, Calibrations and Notes\n\nAfter 30 minutes it will hide again
First use the menu to scan for your BT device or change the Data Source in Settings!
First configure your wifi wixel reader ip addresses or parakeet url
Now start your sensor or check Settings
Please wait while sensor warms up! (
Possible bad calibration slope, please have a glass of water, wash hands, then recalibrate in a few!
Please wait, need 2 readings from transmitter first.
Please enter two calibrations to get started!
Now pair with your Dexcom Share
Now choose start your sensor in your settings
Double Check Dex Receiver Serial Number, should be 10 characters, don\'t forget the letters
Please set your Dex Receiver Serial Number in App Settings
Unfortunately your android version does not support Bluetooth Low Energy
No keep Parakeet as it is
Are you sure you want to switch the Parakeet to setup mode?\n\nNormally this is only used to send further text messages to the Parakeet to reconfigure the transmitter it listens for etc.
mmol/l or mg/dl high and low
Not for medical use - research tool only
Extrapolate data to try to predict lows
Insulin, Carb ratios etc for models
Linear model carbs absorbed per hour
Enter 10 Character Dexcom Receiver Serial Number
Shows a persistent notification graph, visible on lock-screen and prevents android killing the service.

The tags entered here will be logged into xDrip. Format is tag:level. Level can be v,d,i. For example bgreading:i,DexCollectionService:v. This tags will be logged with low priority to Error and event list.
Enter more tags to be logged
Send data to Android Wear Watchface.
Connect Wear to BT Collector when phone is out-of-range
Force phone to use Wear Collection Service
Disable Force Wear Collection Service on Wear Low Battery Alert
Disable Force Wear Collection Service on Minutes since last Reading from Wear
Minutes since last Reading from Wear
Force phone to use this Wear Collection Service
Send Wear logs to Event Viewer
Prefix used for Wear log entries
Collect and display Step counter when available
Message to display when BGL hits the special value above
Text to display when hitting special value
Older gratuitous wakelocks which can drain extra battery but might be needed for NightWatch or Android Wear
Upload data to Dexcoms Servers so you can use your data with Dexcoms apps
Manage your existing followers and invite new ones.
Insulin Sensitivity: glucose drop per Unit
Speak your treatment eg:\nx.x units insulin / xx grams carbs
Default to voice input next time
Entering a calibration now will override your previously entered calibration.
This does not get used for anything, its just to keep track of differences for algorithem improvement purposes

Here you can save the settings to the external storage (sdcard).

Once saved to the external storage it is potentially possible for any app to read the settings which might contain sensitive information.

You are advised to delete the settings once you have imported them again if you are concerned about this.
Use QR codes to transfer settings using Settings->Auto Configure feature
xDrip Plus Security Key Settings only
Sensor is ready, please enter an initial calibration
In order to get started, please perform one or two finger prick tests and enter the values here!
Long Press to Split or Delete
Press and Hold on the background to Split or Delete a time block
Get notified of new apk releases
Choose Stable, Beta or Alpha releases
Web feedback form for sending messages and ratings of xDrip+ to the developers
This device will send data to followers
Send Parakeet map location to followers
Temporary work-around option, completely stops all synchronization. May need reboot after being re-enabled. Use with care!
Automatic Updates, crash reports and Feedback to Developer

Please enter your question or comments here.

If you supply an email address you may get a response.
Optional contact info here, eg email
Please indicate what you think of the app generally
Couldn\'t write to sdcard - check permissions?
Could not load preferences - check permissions or file?
Warning settings from xDrip and xDrip+ exist - loading xDrip+
Choose sound used for persistent high alarm.
Notify when predicted low time reaches threshold
Choose sound used for predicted low alarm.
Notify when parakeet device stops checking in
Raise parakeet notifiction silently when charging
Alerts start out snoozed and must persist for a while to actually trigger
Keep snoozing if glucose is heading in the right direction
Don\'t alert if glucose is heading in the right direction
Show Tiny dots instead of Small dots on the graph
Set the trend period to display
Vibrate watch to alert when we are not getting any glucose data
Special glucose value to display the message below
Store sensor locaton to help algorithm improvement
Help the developers improve the xDrip algorithm.
Double tap or pinch to zoom.
Try to work around noisy readings
Show tips / hints describing button functions etc. Uncheck and Recheck to reset to the beginning
Key is used instead of Google account
Re-raise every \n x minutes if\n unaknowledged:
(Long Press an existing alert to edit)
After calibration, adjust recent raw graph to smooth to the new calibration
Useful for noise and missed readings
If the phone has text-to-speech capabilities it will speak each new reading.
Use last 24 hours instead of time since midnight for statistics.
Disabling Force Wear Collection Service due to Wear Low Battery!
Disabling Force Wear Collection Service due to %1$d minutes of missed readings on watch!
If using a private InfluxDB database, this should be enabled
Replace example values in {}\'s with your correct values
The database where to store measurements. Remember to create this on the server.
Username for authentication. It is recommended to not allow usage without authentication.
Password for authentication. It is recommended to not allow usage without authentication.
Vibrate watch on active glucose alerts
Attach it to a pebble button to instantly Snooze any active alert from your watch. Also for Remote Snooze feature.
For interacting with other compatible apps
Use noise smoothing and plugins etc (if enabled) for broadcasted value
Send broadcasts without locking to the older permission model
Process treatment data received from NSClient app
Process calibrations received from other apps
Custom Locale for Spoken Readings, eg: de or en_IN
Speak the glucose value twice each time
Show a shortcut in the ☰ menu to toggle Speak Readings
On Android 6+ ensure battery optimization is switched off. Recommended
Don\'t keep asking about battery optimization. Not recommended
Automatically enable bluetooth if it is switched off when we try to connect to a bluetooth device
Reset Bluetooth by turning it off and on if we don\'t get anything in 20 minutes
Reset Bluetooth by turning it off and on as a way to keep the G5 data source working. Without this the G5 collector may fail.
If the bluetooth watchdog activates often then you can try unchecking this option to see if it helps
Older bluetooth wakelocks which can drain extra battery but might be needed for bluetooth reception
Reset Bluetooth by turning it off and on every few minutes! Only select if you are testing. It may disrupt anything else using bluetooth.
Experimental support for \'Transmiter\' device from @FPV-UAV - test only
Experimental support for rfduino from Tomasz Stachowicz
Repeatedly restart the collection service at any hint of missing data. Enable only if you are getting data loss.
Old method - Not Recommended! Attempts to predict readings each minute based on the past few values.
If using Share, xDrip will show values when they are normally hidden on the receiver.
If needed, use calibrations from longer ago, eg if calibrations are supplied infrequently.
Send Event and Error List Logs automatically to the developer
Only enable if you are having trouble with the app.
Show Calibration and BG datatables in the app drawer.
Disable the warning for low transmitter battery state on the home screen. (Only relevant for DIY receivers.)
Allows changing the most unsafe settings which could break everything!
Show calibration accuracy evaluation from last 3 days
Also show the extra status line on the widget
Show slope and intercept in long form.
Show slope and intercept in short form.
Show slope and glucose data from the active plugin
Choose whether to calibrate with the BG value in a Treatment entry
Show glucose results from the plugin on the main graph
Main glucose display number comes from plugin!
ALL new glucose data will be calculated and saved from the selected plugin and not from the standard xDrip algorithm. This is untested and may be inaccurate and buggy. Use with extreme caution.
Original narrower range of allowed slopes within xDrip classic calibration algorithm (pre-2017). Default slopes more likely! (engineering mode only)
How are you going to receive data from your Dexcom/Transmitter?
Options for scanning NFC based sensors with the phone handset

Allow sensors to be scanned when app is open. Historic data will be back-filled. Highly experiemental! Beware this can maybe break a sensor. Test phone compatibility with an almost expired sensor first. You have been warned!
Show the sensor expiry time based on 14.5 days
Show the sensor age on the main screen
NFC scanning will only occur when xDrip+ app is visible
NFC scanning will also work from your app launcher screen
Beep when scanning within xDrip+ app
ID of your Dexcom Transmitter, eg 12AB3
Advanced G5 settings for rare situations
Some devices work better when scanning constantly, others do not. If reading is reliable when this setting is not selected, you should have improved battery life. Normally best to keep this disabled
This is crucial for some Android devices to properly connect, but can cause missed readings when other UI intensive activities are in use.
This will attempt a full authentication each read attempt. Needed for newer G5 transmitter firmware versions.
This will remove the G5 from your device\'s paired device list, and attempt a full authentication and bonding with each read attempt.
Experimental mode which doesn\'t use raw data
Options for Nightscout, MongoDB or Dexcom Share uploading
For local servers with 192.168.x.x addresses, skip uploads when there is no local network connectivity.
Enable this to upload to Dexcom\'s servers
Upload BG values as Dexcom Share
Disabled = Your account and follower apps are from outside the USA
Enabled = Your account and follower apps are from the USA
Automatically connect and retrieve data from a standards compliant glucose meter like the Contour Next One
Enable this to play sound effects when the meter connects, disconnects or syncs data
When a new blood glucose result is received, ask if that should be used to calibrate with
Calibrate using new blood glucose readings if the conditions appear right to do so without asking confirmation (experimental)
The maximum value you consider to be in range.
The minimum value you consider to be in range.
Pressing the volume up or down button will snooze an active alarm when in the app
Create a shortcut from main navigation to bg level screen
Suppress snoozed and active alerts after predefined period of missed readings
Suppress snoozed and active alerts after .. minutes (minimum 10)
Alert when a calibration is requested
How many hours between calibration requests
Set sound used for calibration requests.
Uncheck to not ask for calibrations when phone is charging
Keep alerting if no calibration is performed
Number of minutes to pass before raising the same calibration request.
Alert after x minutes of noisy values
Number of minutes before raising the same alert after snooze.
Reraise the alert if not snoozed sooner
Number of SECONDS to pass before raising the same alert.
Set sound used for BG Alerts.
Override Silent mode on these alerts
When momentum trend indicates a Low would be predicted
Notify when battery level goes below
Notify when data arrives from the master if the interval is > 20 mins.
Currently using your device\'s local language
Currently forcing use of alternate language
If you need an alternate language translation within xDrip+
Show a high and low line on the widget.
Delayed but more stable when noisy (not recommended)
Display Insulin/Carb calculations at all times
Show extra and alpha test features
Display mathamatical simulations based on profile data and carbs/insulin logs
Snoozes will silence all handsets in group with the accept setting below enabled on them
Pop up a dialog to confirm sending each remote snooze
Allow remote handsets to silence alarms on this one
Only accept if the remote wifi network name starts with the same letters as ours and matches very closely
Use sensors to detect types of motion
Store recent motion types and plot these on the main graph
Motion data taken from remote rather than local handset source
Be the master for motion data even if we are a follower. Set this on only one handset!
When vehicle motion is detected enable extra features
Increase the level at which Low alarms will be triggered when in vehicle mode
Notification sound when vehicle mode detected
Repeat notification sound every 90 minutes if still in vehicle mode
Send data to developers about success rates of different devices
Status: %s / VoltageA: %d / VoltageB: %d / Resistance: %d / Run Time: %d / Temperature: %d
Status: %s / Firmware: %s / BT-Firmware: %s / Other-FW: %s / hardwareV: %d / asic: %d
The android version of this device is not compatible with Bluetooth Low Energy
You can disconnect from this device or forget its pairing here
Volume Profile changed by Tasker to: %1$s
VOLUME command must be followed by volume profile name: %1$s
Error on BGReading sync, probably decryption key mismatch
Invalid persistent high for longer than minutes setting: using 60 mins instead
Error on Bloodtest sync, probably decryption key mismatch
Somehow ended up with null calibration list!
Calibrated using data beyond last 4 days
No suitable app to show an image!
Please confirm the bluetooth pairing request
Failed to pair, may need to do it via Android Settings
Refusing to create a treatement more than 1 hours in the future!
Error on treatment, probably decryption key mismatch
DISABLED MOTION TRACKING DUE TO FAILURES! See Error Log!
Shut down motion detection! See Error Logs - Please report to developer
Google Play Services update download needed for Motion
Google Play Services update download needed for Motion. Download update via Google Play Store and try motion again after installed.
Still in Vehicle mode, duration: %1$d mins
Attempting to create pairing bond - device must be in pairing mode!
Cannot process glucose record as we do not know device time!
Waiting for 15 minutes more sensor data for calibration
Device not found. Unable to connect.
Starting Scanning\nMake sure meter is turned on - For pairing hold the meter power button until it flashes blue
You may need to enable the meter\'s pairing mode by holding the power button when turning it on until it flashes blue
If you want to unbond use Android bluetooth system settings to Forget device
This probably only works on HM10/HM11 devices at the moment and takes a minute
Please Enable G5 Always Authenticate debug option!
Swipe left and right to see different report tabs. Choose time period for Today, Yesterday, 7 Days etc. Full screen mode, print colors and Sharing are supported from the butttons and 3 dot menu.
Flag reading as \"bad\".\nFlagged readings have no impact on the statistics.
Disable this calibration?\nFlagged calibrations will no longer have an effect.
Please ensure careportal plugin is enabled on nightscout for treatment upload!
xDrip Data collection service is running.
Dear developers, please may I request that you add translation capability for: %1$s\n\n
No text entered - cannot send blank
Without camera permission we cannot scan a barcode
Without Location permission android bluetooth scan doesn\'t work
Is this device running a collector?\n\n%1$s.local can be automatically added to list of receivers
Devices discovered on the local network can be added or removed as collectors by tapping on them.
Error processing settings - no data - try again?
This can sometimes crash / break a sensor!\nWith some phones there can be problems, try on expiring sensor first for safety. You have been warned.
Show the sensor expiry time based on %1$s days
Install Text-To-Speech Data?\n(After installation of languages you might have to press \"Restart Collector\" in System Status.)
Got error parsing number in calibration
Calibration sent to master for processing
No active Low Alert exists, without this there will be no alert on low glucose! Please add or enable a low alert.
This device does not seem to support bluetooth
Bluetooth is turned off on this device currently
Enter Your Dexcom Receiver Serial Number
Warning, no alert will be played at phone silent/vibrate mode!!!
Each alert should have it\'s own threshold. Please choose another threshold.
threshold has to be between %1$s and %2$s
High alert threshold has to be higher than all low alerts. Please choose another threshold.
Low alert threshold has to be lower than all high alerts. Please choose another threshold.

The following logs will be sent to the developers:

Please also include your email address or we will not know who they are from!
Could not package up all logs, using most recent
Are you sure you wish to snooze all other devices in your sync group?
Took too long to confirm! Ignoring!
ERROR: Connecting to Google Services - check google login or reboot?
It appears we haven\'t been able to send/receive sync data for the last:
This device is not supported for play services.
Having problems decrypting incoming data - check keys
Receiving motion updates from a different master! Make only one the master!
Custom sync key is too short - make it >16 characters
Unusual internal context problem - please report
xDrip+ needs whitelisting for proper performance
Device does not appear to support battery optimization whitelisting!
This app needs battery optimization whitelisting or it will not work well. Please reset app preferences

Is your typical blood glucose value:

5.5 (mmol/L)
or 100 (mg/dL)

Please select below
You have an old experimental glucose prediction setting enabled. This is NOT RECOMMENDED and could mess things up badly. Shall I disable this for you?
No, I really know what I\'m doing
Do you want to use this synced finger-stick blood glucose result to calibrate with? (you can change when this dialog is displayed in Settings)
Got calibration in the future - cannot process!
Do you want to use this entered finger-stick blood glucose test to calibrate with?\n\n(you can change when this dialog is displayed in Settings)
Are you sure you want to delete this Blood Test result?
Recommend that you change WiFi to always be on during sleep

Your WiFi is set to sleep when the phone screen is off. This may cause problems if you don\'t have cellular data or have devices on your local network. Would you like to go to the settings page to set: Always Keep WiFi on during Sleep?
\n LOW AND HIGH ALERTS CURRENTLY DISABLED
filtered data is exactly double raw sensor data which looks wrong! (Transmitter maybe dead)

Activity Motion Detection is experimental and only some phones are compatible. Its main purpose is to detect vehicle mode. In tests it seems higher end phones are the most likely to properly support the sensors needed for it to work. It may also drain your battery. For exercise related movement, Smartwatch step counters work better.
You are using an xDrip+ variant

xDrip+ variants allow multiple apps to be installed at once. Either for advanced use or to allow xDrip-Experimental and xDrip+ to both be installed at the same time. With variants, some things might not work properly due to one app or another having exclusive access, for example bluetooth pairing. Feedback and bug reports about variants is welcomed!
Snoozing alert due to volume button press
Do you really want to import \'%1$s\'?\nThis may negatively affect the data integrity of your system!
LibreAlarm data format appears incompatible!? protocol changed?
Swipe left and right to see different status tabs.
Adjust note text here. There is no undo of this
The parakeet has connected to the web service.
The parakeet has not connected > %1$d mins
Error - is app engine receiver recent enough?
\nTrying to use an existing mBluetoothGatt for connection.
\nTrying to create a new connection to device
Location permission needed to use Bluetooth!
We need to know when the sensor was inserted to improve calculation accuracy. Was it inserted today?
ERROR: SENSOR START TIME IN FUTURE
Do you want to delete and reset the calibrations for this sensor?
\n- This device does not seem to support bluetooth
\n- Bluetooth seems to be turned off
\n- The android version of this device is not compatible with Bluetooth Low Energy
\n- Your device has future data on it, Please double check the time and timezone on this phone.
\n- Bluetooth unbonded, if using share tell it to forget your device.
\n- Scan for devices again to set connection back up!
\nG5 Transmitter unbonded, switch device mode to prevent re-pairing to G5.
Will attempt to read battery status on next sensor reading
